  invalidate) a hypothesis.

## Write Test Title Here
*Test owner*: @_

## HYPOTHESIS
*We believe that* [user]:
*Need* [function]:
*In order to* [benefit]: 
*This will increase our North Star Metric by* [number]: 

## TEST
*To verify that, we will:*
- [ ] Step 1
- [ ] Step 2
- [ ] Step 3

## METRIC
*And measure:*
- [ ] Metric 1
- [ ] Metric 2

## CRITERIA
*We are right if:*
- [ ] Success criteria 1
- [ ] Success criteria 2
